home.title: 👋 Hi, I’m Mateusz — Mobile & Web Developer
home.subtitle: Crafting simple, effective digital experiences

section.title: About me
section.text: I’m a student and freelance developer who loves working with clients to bring their ideas to life. My focus is on creating simple, effective solutions for complex problems — always using the right tool for the job. I build apps, websites, and automations, and I’m also passionate about artificial intelligence, from traditional machine learning to generative AI. Client-centered and ready to help you turn concepts into working products.
